reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of Sarah.
A front view portrait of Gus.
text_prompt: Create a scene inside the sparsely furnished lighthouse keeper's quarters. A wooden table sits in the center of the frame where a woman with short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes, sits meticulously cleaning a nautical chart. The woman's appearance should reference Image 0. A scruffy, medium-sized mixed-breed dog lies at the woman's feet. The dog's appearance should reference Image 3. Sunlight streams in through a window on the right, casting long shadows across the room.
